actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.
Committee on Banking requested executive comment from Bureau of the Mint.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to provide for the striking of a medal commemorating the two hundred and fiftieth anniversary of the founding of the State of Georgia.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to strike and furnish to the Semiquincentenary Commission of the State of Georgia medals commemorating the 250th anniversary of the founding of the State. Prohibits the striking of such medals after December 31, 1983. Requires security satisfactory to the Secretary to indemnify payment of specified costs.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the striking of a medal commemorating the two hundred and fiftieth anniversary of the founding of the State of Georgia.
